ygData.subject: Re: EQ weekend update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [snip] ... Some people seem to like this role. Personally I had hoped the bard would, at high levels, have a little more active role in things than just
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Jan 24/00, Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:

>
> > 2. Great. Now I can look forward to being a portable manastone. Yay.
[snip]
>
> I am NOT un happy being the "portable mana-stone" at all. My groups love
> me!

Some people seem to like this role. Personally I had hoped the bard
would, at high levels, have a little more active role in things than
just playing the support class for the support classes. This is the main
reason my L50 druid now gets played a lot more than my bard these days.

And the real bad news is, I now prefer bards who just play the mana
song. :-{

With clarity and the mana song playing, I can sit down during the fight
and practically regain all the mana a starfire cost me in 15 sec.



--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
